import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaUser, FaSignInAlt, FaInfoCircle, FaQuestionCircle, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; const LandingPage = () => { const cardStyle = { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', borderRadius: '15px', boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)', transition: 'transform 0.3s ease-in-out', height: '100%', // Ensure cards stretch to fill the column height }; return (

Welcome to CrickBidders

Your ultimate platform for cricket auctions!

 {/* About Us and How to Use Section */} {/* About Us Cards */}

About Us

 CrickBidders is a premier platform dedicated to cricket enthusiasts and organizers who want to engage in online auctions for cricket tournaments. Our mission is to make cricket auctions accessible and enjoyable for teams, players, and fans alike.

Why Choose Us?

 We offer an intuitive, secure platform where cricket enthusiasts can interact and engage in live auctions, providing seamless user experiences for committee leaders, team heads, and players.

Our Vision

 Our vision is to revolutionize cricket auctions with innovative features, making them more inclusive, transparent, and accessible to all participants. {/* How to Use CrickBidders Section */}

How to Use CrickBidders
  • Register as a committee leader, team head, or player.
  • Set up an auction or join an existing team.
  • Bid on players, track points, and build your team!

Advanced Features

 CrickBidders offers premium features including detailed player analytics, real-time auction status, and customizable team strategies.

Seamless Experience

 Our platform offers a seamless experience with easy navigation, fast bidding processes, and real-time auction updates. {/* Contact Us Section */}

Contact Us

 If you have any questions or need support, feel free to reach out.
Name: Email: Message:
); }; export default LandingPage;
